description: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau says there’s a backlash against progressive policies, and that, despite pressure, he is staying on as leader to ensure continued focus on such issues as diversity and climate change. “At this time of backlash against progressive policies of inclusion and diversity, you know, are we going to double down on making […]
title: Trudeau Says There’s Backlash Against Progressive Policies of Inclusion and Diversity

description: Labor says it will introduce 50 state-owned bulk billing clinics to the state, but medical groups say they just need more doctors.
title: Queensland Labor’s Plan for 50 State-Owned GP Clinics Fails to Impress Peak Medical Body

description: Building and construction, cafes and restaurants, and hairdressing and beauty services topped the list of industries the ATO was tipped off about in 2023/24.
title: Australian Tax Office Receives Over 250,000 Tip-Offs Since 2019

description: Bill Vigars, who led the promotion of Terry Fox’s Marathon of Hope in 1980, has died at the age of 78. His wife, Sherry MacDonald, confirmed the news in an interview, saying Vigars died of congestive heart failure on Thursday surrounded by loved ones at a hospital in White Rock, B.C. She said he fought […]
title: Bill Vigars, Campaign Manager for Terry Fox Marathon of Hope, Dies at 78

description: 'It is part of the broader adjustments the U.S. military has made in recent months,' the DOD says.
title: Pentagon to Send Advanced Missile Defense System and Troops to Israel

description: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau has announced the Liberal Party’s new campaign chair, as some MPs reportedly band together to ask their leader to step down. Trudeau and the party say Andrew Bevan, a longtime Liberal staff member and volunteer, is taking the reins ahead of the next general election. Bevan most recently served as an […]
title: Liberals Appoint Andrew Bevan as Campaign Head Amid Talk of MP Revolt Against Trudeau

description: Health Canada has issued a product hazard alert on a recall of infant swings manufactured by the U.S. toy company Fisher-Price due to a suffocation risk. “As of October 7, 2024, the company has received 5 reports of deaths involving infants when the Fisher-Price Snuga Swing was used for sleep,” Health Canada said. The recall, […]
title: Urgent Recall of Fisher-Price Swings After Reports of Five Infant Deaths

description: Turkey announced on Oct. 11 it would impose anti-dumping duties on some steel imports from China, Russia, India, and Japan, with the highest tax rate on imports from China. The duties range from 6.1 percent to 43.31 percent of cost, insurance, and freight prices, according to the announcement by the Turkey’s Official Gazette. The duties […]
title: Turkey Imposes Anti-Dumping Duties on China, Russia, India, Japan Steel Imports

description: Canadian psychologist and author Jordan Peterson says he has received an offer from his regulatory college that paying the court-ordered legal fees to the college related to his challenge against the college’s social media training order could be waived provided he resigns from his profession. In a National Post opinion piece published on Oct. 11, […]
title: Jordan Peterson Says Regulatory College Offered to Waive Legal Costs if He Resigns

description: Economists expect inflation continued its downward trend last month, giving the Bank of Canada the all-clear to continue cutting its benchmark interest rate. “We are looking for headline inflation to cool below the bank’s two-per-cent target in September,” said BMO economist Shelly Kaushik. Kaushik said she expects annual headline inflation cooled to 1.8 percent, largely […]
title: Economists Predict Inflation Dipped Below Two Percent in September

description: A nationwide recall has been issued for the Rana brand Tagliatelle Seasoned White Chicken & Mushroom Sauce due to possible listeria contamination. The Canadian Food Inspection Agency says consumers should not use, sell, serve or distribute the recalled product. The recall involves packages weighing 1.14 kg and with best before dates of Oct. 10 up […]
title: Nationwide Recall Issued for Seasoned Chicken and Mushroom Pasta Sauce

description: Montreal police say a man is dead following a fatal altercation on a downtown metro station platform late Saturday. Const. Jean-Pierre Brabant says a 37-year-old man was stabbed in the upper body during a fight at about 11:20 p.m. with another person on the eastbound train platform. The victim was taken to hospital where he […]
title: Man Dead After Stabbing on Downtown Montreal Metro Station Platform

description: Hot air balloons fill the skies above New Mexico during the Albuquerque International Balloon Fiesta at 8 a.m. ET on Oct. 13.
title: LIVE NOW: Hot Air Balloons Fill the Skies Above New Mexico

description: The FAAA was concerned that the current threshold would subject a number of investors to high risks due to misclassification.
title: Classification for ‘Professional Financial Investor’ Outdated and Needs Reform, Peak Body Says

description: Veterans have criticised a plan to give Australian troops a $1,000 (US$675) cash bonus if they recruit a friend into the military. The two-year trial will begin within the next month to help grow the size of the Australian Defence Force (ADF) and retain people. The federal budget handed down in May showed the forecast […]
title: Cash Bonuses for Australian Troops to Recruit Mates

description: SAO PAULO—More than 1.6 million people in Sao Paulo were without power on Saturday more than 16 hours after a brief but powerful storm swept through South America’s largest city. Officials in Sao Paulo state said that record wind gusts Friday night of up to 67 mph (108 kph) knocked down transmission lines and uprooted […]
title: Powerful Storm Knocks out Power to 1.6 Million in Brazil’s Largest City

description: MOSCOW—An explosion at a gas station in Russia’s southern region of Chechnya killed at least four people, officials said Saturday. The explosion of a gas tank triggered a fire at the service station in the regional capital, Grozny, said Russia’s Emergencies Ministry, adding that two children were among the dead. The fire was extinguished. Grozny […]
title: An Explosion and Fire at a Service Station in Russia’s Chechnya Kills 4

description: Police found a woman bleeding heavily outside of her Queensland residence.
title: Australian Woman’s Arm Severed by Her Own Dog in Attack

description: Campaigning continues over the Thanksgiving long weekend for political leaders in British Columbia, Saskatchewan, and New Brunswick, with parties in B.C. releasing more campaign promises, full platforms being publicized in Saskatchewan, and leaders casting early ballots in New Brunswick. With the election in B.C. just a week away, leaders of the three main political parties […]
title: Political Leaders Campaigning Over Thanksgiving Weekend in 3 Provinces

description: SEOUL, South Korea—The sister of North Korean leader Kim Jong Un on Saturday accused South Korea of deliberately avoiding responsibility for the alleged flights of South Korean drones over the North’s capital, and warned of a “terrible calamity” if they continue. The statement by Kim Yo Jong came a day after North Korea’s Foreign Ministry […]
title: Sister of North Korea’s Leader Threatens South Korea Over Drone Flights
